snippet.title: Metro Exodus E3 2018 Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
In Metro Exodus, you'll explore vast open levels as you journey across post-apocalyptic Russia.

All footage from this trailer was captured in-game from a single level.  Welcome... to the Volga!
